item.title: Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Well I am having a problem compiling… help?

this is error:

client.java:9357: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:9357: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ 9 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

This is code…

if (command.startsWith("onpickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Previn")) { resetPickup(); String otherPName = command.substring(9); } } if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { { try { int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); if (emote < 3999 && emote > 0) { pEmote = emote; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sM("Bad emote ID"); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Bad emote ID"); } }
